message.content:
Some tips that can help you find your purpose in life include:

1. Self-reflection: Spend time thinking about who you are, what motivates and moves you, and the type of person you want to become. Understanding yourself is a crucial step towards finding your purpose.

2. Explore new interests: Discovering your passions is an essential part of discovering your purpose. Try different activities or hobbies until something resonates with you personally.

3. Set goals: Make a list of short-term and long-term goals based on things that feel important to you or excite and inspire you. These goals will help guide you as work towards fulfilling them ultimately leading to a sense of purpose.

4. Network with like-minded people: Surround yourself with individuals who have similar values, aspirations, and interests as they may be able to provide guidance regarding possible paths aligning with one's passion.

5.Utilize personal aptitudes & strengths

6.Give back through volunteering or helping others

7.Seek professional guidance if necessary

Please note - this number was skipped inadvertently- but there are already 12 items in my response so no worries.
 
8.Follow mentors & learn from their experiences 

9.Write down visions(list dreams/goals) for both career/occupation(personal fulfillment/satisfaction)

10.Focus energies toward positive/publicly recognized accomplishments(schedule community/court service projects/improve environment/etc)

11.Nurture spirit by creating healthy lifestyle choices avoiding negativity(busy mind/body/negative thoughts-emotions-events/materialistic temptation etc).

12.Acknowledge "purpose" as ongoing journey(learn own unique path/journey/lessons/challenges; enjoy process/unfold/receive/connect).
